title: Beef and chorizo with horseradish mash and rosemary dumplings
description: Braise shin of beef with chorizo and red wine for this long and you won’t be disappointed.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz shin of beef, cut into 4cm/1½in pieces
2 large carrots, cut to same size as beef
2 large parsnips, cut to same size as beef
salt and freshly ground black pepper
900g/2lb potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
25g/1oz fresh grated horseradish, or to taste
